wikipedia_page.main: Major General Francis Hedley Roberton "Buster" Howes,  (born 22 March 1960) is a former Royal Marines officer who was Commandant General Royal Marines from February 2010 to December 2011.

response: * Chief Executive: Major General Buster Howes CB OBE - Royal Marines officer and former Commandant General Royal Marines. Joined the organisation in June 2020.
